annualInvestmentAllowance.title: Annual investment allowance
annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Annual investment allowance on items that qualify up to the AIA amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.title: Business Premises Renovation Allowance
businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Business Premises Renovation Allowance if converting or renovating unused qualifying business premises. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceMainPool.title: Capital allowance main pool
capitalAllowanceMainPool.description: Capital allowances at 18% on equipment, including cars with lower CO2 emissions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.title: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance
zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.title: Capital allowance special rate pool
capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.description: Capital allowances at 8% on equipment, including cars with higher CO2 emissions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

enhancedCapitalAllowance.title: Enhanced capital allowance
enhancedCapitalAllowance.description: 100% and other enhanced capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

allowanceOnSales.title: Allowances on sales
allowanceOnSales.description: Allowances on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for less than their tax value). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceSingleAssetPool.title: Capital Allowances for single asset pool costs
capitalAllowanceSingleAssetPool.description: Capital Allowances for single asset pool costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

tradingAllowance.title: Trading Allowance
tradingAllowance.description: A tax exemption of a limited amount for individuals with trading income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
